tabs.title: Company Overview
tabs.content:
**Galewind Logistics** is a global shipping and freight forwarding company. They are migrating their shipment tracking and archival systems to Azure to improve scalability and reliability.

**Current Environment:**
- Primary focus on shipment document management and real-time tracking.
- Hybrid cloud strategy with on-premises offices in Chicago and London.
- Heavy use of Azure Storage for archival and VM-based workloads for processing.

tabs.title: IT Infrastructure
tabs.content:
**Compute:**
- Approximately 40 virtual machines running Windows Server.
- Use of Azure App Service for tracking APIs.
- Deployment of VM Scale Sets for variable workloads.

**Storage:**
- Multiple StorageV2 accounts for hot and cool archival data.
- Integration with on-premises file servers via Azure File Sync.
- Extensive use of blob storage for shipment document scans and tracking images.
